title: The Gaffer, Sam's Father (1R291)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 1 • Hobbit
Strength:	2

Site:	1
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert The Gaffer to heal Frodo or Sam.
Lore:	“No one had a more attentive audience than old Ham Gamgee, commonly known as the Gaffer. He held forth at The Ivy Bush, a small inn on the Bywater road; and he spoke with some authority, for he had tended the garden at Bag End for forty yea
Rarity:	R
